title: Revenue of Sonic Corporation in the U.S. from 2009 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 606.32 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 477.27 was reported at Year 2017
